languages.text: "Ты — вершитель{mf||ница} воли Неумирающего, но... Я гляжу на места, где проходит твоя жизнь, и удивляюсь. Кажется, стезя твоя менее строга и требовательна к мыслям и деяниям. Вокруг нас много..." {n}Она задумывается.{/n} "...блеска".

"You are empowered by the will of the Undying One Himself, and yet... when I look at your life, I am surprised: you follow a different thread, one that does not seem as strict to your thoughts and deeds. There is so much..." {n}She thinks for a moment.{/n} "...lustre."
languages.original_text: "Ты — вершитель{mf||ница} воли Неумирающего, но... Я гляжу на места, где проходит твоя жизнь, и удивляюсь. Кажется, стезя твоя менее строга и требовательна к мыслям и деяниям. Вокруг нас много..." {n}Она задумывается.{/n} "...блеска".

traits.locale_text: "You are the Undying One's chosen, and yet... When I look at your life, I am surprised. You follow a different way, one that does not seem as strict to your thoughts and deeds. There is so much..." {n}She thinks for a moment.{/n} "...lustre."

"You are the Undying One's chosen, and yet... When I look at your life, I am surprised. You follow a different way, one that does not seem as strict to your thoughts and deeds. There is so much..." {n}She thinks for a moment.{/n} "...lustre."

"You are empowered by the will of the Undying One Himself, and yet... when I look at your life, I am surprised: you follow a different thread, one that does not seem as exacting of your thoughts and deeds. There is so much..." {n}She thinks for a moment.{/n} "...lustre."

"You are among the Undying One's chosen, and yet... when I look at your life, I am surprised: you follow a different way, one that does not seem as strict to your thoughts and deeds. There is so much..." {n}She thinks for a moment.{/n} "...lustre."

"You are empowered by the will of the Undying One Himself, and yet... when I look at your life, I am surprised: you follow a different thread, one that does not seem as strict to your thoughts and deeds. There is so much..." {n}She thinks for a moment.{/n} "...lustre."

"You are empowered by the will of the Undying One Himself, and yet... when I look at your life, I am surprised: you follow a different thread, one that does not seem as exacting of your thoughts and deeds. There is so much..." {n}She thinks for a moment.{/n} "...lustre."

"You are empowered by the will of the Undying One Himself, and yet... when I look at your life, I am surprised: you follow a different thread, one that does not seem as strict to your thoughts and deeds. There is so much..." {n}She thinks for a moment.{/n} "...lustre."

languages.text: «La voluntad del Inmortal le otorga poder, y aun así... cuando observo su vida, me sorprende: sigue un hilo muy distinto, uno que no parece tan estricto con sus pensamientos y actos. Hay tanto...». {n}Piensa durante un momento.{/n} «... Brillo».
languages.original_text: "You are empowered by the will of the Undying One Himself, and yet... when I look at your life, I am surprised: you follow a different thread, one that does not seem as strict to your thoughts and deeds. There is so much..." {n}She thinks for a moment.{/n} "...lustre."

traits.locale_text: «La voluntad del Inmortal le otorga poder, y aun así... cuando observo su vida, me sorprende: sigue un hilo muy distinto, uno que no parece tan estricto con sus pensamientos y actos. Hay tanto...». {n}Piensa durante un momento.{/n} «... Brillo».

languages.text: 「あなたは不死の者のご意思に力を与えられた者。だというのに…あなたの人生を見ると、驚かされる。あなたは考えや行為が厳格とは思えないような、異なる糸を辿っている。あまりにも…」{n}彼女は束の間、考える。{/n}「煌びやかだわ」
languages.original_text: "You are empowered by the will of the Undying One Himself, and yet... when I look at your life, I am surprised: you follow a different thread, one that does not seem as strict to your thoughts and deeds. There is so much..." {n}She thinks for a moment.{/n} "...lustre."

traits.locale_text: 「あなたは不死の者のご意思に力を与えられた者。だというのに…あなたの人生を見ると、驚かされる。あなたは考えや行為が厳格とは思えないような、異なる糸を辿っている。あまりにも…」{n}彼女は束の間、考える。{/n}「煌びやかだわ」

languages.text: “你是不死之神的神选者，得到了祂的恩赐。然而……当我审视你的生活方式时，我却惊讶地发现，你的丝线截然不同。你选择的道路对你的思想行为并没有那么多严格的要求，而且充满了……”{n}她思索片刻。{/n}“……光明。”
languages.original_text: "You are empowered by the will of the Undying One Himself, and yet... when I look at your life, I am surprised: you follow a different thread, one that does not seem as strict to your thoughts and deeds. There is so much..." {n}She thinks for a moment.{/n} "...lustre."

traits.locale_text: “你是不死之神的神选者，得到了祂的恩赐。然而……当我审视你的生活方式时，我却惊讶地发现，你的丝线截然不同。你选择的道路对你的思想行为并没有那么多严格的要求，而且充满了……”{n}她思索片刻。{/n}“……光明。”

languages.text: "Ihr wurdet durch den Willen des Todlosen selbst ermächtigt, und doch ... wenn ich Euer Leben betrachte, bin ich überrascht: Ihr folgt einem anderen Faden, der Eure Gedanken und Taten nicht so strikt regelt. Da ist so viel ..." {n}Sie denkt einen Augenblick nach.{/n} "... schimmernder Glanz."
languages.original_text: "You are empowered by the will of the Undying One Himself, and yet... when I look at your life, I am surprised: you follow a different thread, one that does not seem as strict to your thoughts and deeds. There is so much..." {n}She thinks for a moment.{/n} "...lustre."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr wurdet durch den Willen des Todlosen selbst ermächtigt, und doch ... wenn ich Euer Leben betrachte, bin ich überrascht: Ihr folgt einem anderen Faden, der Eure Gedanken und Taten nicht so strikt regelt. Da ist so viel ..." {n}Sie denkt einen Augenblick nach.{/n} "... schimmernder Glanz."

languages.text: « Vous avez été {mf|désigné|désignée} par l'Immortel, et pourtant... quand j'observe votre vie, je suis surprise de constater que vous suivez un fil différent, un fil autrement moins restrictif pour vos pensées et agissements. Tout le... » {n}Elle réfléchit quelques instants.{/n} « ... lustre qui vous entoure ne laisse pas de m'interpeller. »
languages.original_text: "You are empowered by the will of the Undying One Himself, and yet... when I look at your life, I am surprised: you follow a different thread, one that does not seem as strict to your thoughts and deeds. There is so much..." {n}She thinks for a moment.{/n} "...lustre."

traits.locale_text: « Vous avez été {mf|désigné|désignée} par l'Immortel, et pourtant... quand j'observe votre vie, je suis surprise de constater que vous suivez un fil différent, un fil autrement moins restrictif pour vos pensées et agissements. Tout le... » {n}Elle réfléchit quelques instants.{/n} « ... lustre qui vous entoure ne laisse pas de m'interpeller. »

languages.original_text: "You are empowered by the will of the Undying One Himself, and yet... when I look at your life, I am surprised: you follow a different thread, one that does not seem as strict to your thoughts and deeds. There is so much..." {n}She thinks for a moment.{/n} "...lustre."

languages.text: "Bizzat Ölmeyen'in arzusundan güç alıyorsun ama yine de... Hayatına göz attığımda şaşkına dönüyorum. Farklı bir ipliği izliyorsun. Düşüncelerine ve eylemlerine karşı müsamahasız görünmeyen bir iplik bu. Çok fazla..." {n}Bir anlığına düşünüyor.{/n} "Parıltı var."
languages.original_text: "You are empowered by the will of the Undying One Himself, and yet... when I look at your life, I am surprised: you follow a different thread, one that does not seem as strict to your thoughts and deeds. There is so much..." {n}She thinks for a moment.{/n} "...lustre."
